name: Word Connect – Best Word Games
description:
If you’re looking for an addictive word puzzle game with offline mode & unlimited free hints, Word Connect is the one for you. Share the fun with your family & friends and enjoy Word Connect now!

Swipe letters and find as many words as possible. Discover all words and enjoy the fun and excitement of building words! With tons of unique levels, you’ll enjoy the challenge of testing your vocabulary while earning tons of coins! Train your brain and learn new words. You can even customize word connect game with colorful themes!

Get stuck? Don’t worry, unlimited free hints are with you. Get free hints by watching rewarded video. You can also share levels and ask friends for help.
No Wi-Fi? Don’t worry, you can play Word Connect offline anytime, anywhere!
Afraid to lose in the game? Don’t worry, with no time limits, you can play word puzzle at your own pace!


FEATURES
• Easy and addictive gameplay! Swipe your letters to build words
• Hundreds of levels with tons of words await you
• Log in everyday and collect your daily bonus
• Unlimited free hints, watch rewarded video for free hints
• Ask your family members and friend for help when get stuck
• With no time limits, discover new words at your own pace
• Simple and colorful graphics will bring you a highly enjoyable game experience
• No internet connection needed! Play anytime, anywhere you want
• Supported on both phone and tablet
• Customize your game with fancy themes
